attributes.action: Do not roll out any form of vaccination certificate in relation to covid 19.
attributes.additional_details: This is a direct threat to our human rights. This is bullying the people into having a vaccination they may not want. WE STILL HAVE THE FREEDOM TO CHOOSE! It should stay that way. We do not need the government forcing us to accept a vaccination just so we can enjoy life like everyone else!
attributes.background: I would like the government to stop all talks in regard to vaccination certificates with immeidate effect.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569957

You may also wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
